website_summaries.verdict: For use with most water bottles and uses no filters, which makes it very portable and inexpensive to run.
pros: Comes with adapters that fit most water bottles
Ultrasonic pulse technology puts out a fine mist, not steam
Easy to take apart and clean
cons: Recommends using only low mineral tap water, which can be a problem for some

customer_reviews.title: This is great for orchids.
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier replaces one I’ve used for my orchids. This one has the benefit of simply filling a bottle with water, screwing on the adapter cap and placing it back on the unit. The previous one I used had a small ‘tank’ that had to be removed and filled. When that tank got dirty, it required more effort to clean. I can just replace the plastic bottle on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bee

customer_reviews.title: I travel for a living as a Pilot. I need something small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So tiny...easy to pack.and yet sprays out a good mist with a directional control. I want a cool mist humidifier that I can point at my face and feel the moisture!! This one does it. I may order one for my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: SHARI DRERUP

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after six weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this humidifier for six weeks and it stopped working two days ago. Very disappointing because it worked well. It was nice because it was small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item. I used it on and off for four weeks before it stopped working. I couldn't return it because the return period had closed. Disappointed and a total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sales-Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS LITTLE HUMIDIFIER
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE TO SAY i WOULD GIVE THIS LITTLE UNIT ALOT MORE STARS IF i COULD. GOT IT YESTERDAY AND USED IT LAST NIGHT OMG LOVE IT .. i HAD ANOTHER ONE SENT IT BACK DIDNT HELP AT ALL AND WHEN I SAW THIS TOOK A CHANCE AND LOVE IT.. AS A MATTER OF FACT I AM GETTING ANOTHER ONE TO HAVE FOR BACK UP.. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS AGAIN LOVE IT ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage wont ever buy it came in all broken didnt work

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a month, but does it put out the mist! So easy to set up, easy to clean, small but mighty!
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Hiserman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, doesn’t work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to find a plastic water bottle that doesn’t collapse. It is very lightweight plastic, tips easily. Would not recommend. Also quite pricey, thought I would get a better humidifier, but not the case.
customer_reviews.author: joyce a. harty

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked. I made several attempts with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is so small and yet puts out like a large one . Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. No more morning bloody noses. I always use distilled water. No white scale cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: B. G. Race

customer_reviews.title: True to description.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little humidifier! My daughter has bought one and I will probably buy another. Be sure to buy water bottles that are the thicker plastic and be aware the range is limited. Well worth the price especially for those of us who live in municipalities where the tap water quality is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Speechpath

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in my work space to ensure it works well. I actually purchased it for my orchids. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cmom55

customer_reviews.title: water bottle humidifier
customer_reviews.text: When it was used the one time it was great,but it broke down and has to be returned. If it worked it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Worked 1X
customer_reviews.text: I used it 1X at work and it was fine. Now the green light just flashes. No mist. I tried emailing but can't get a response from anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LoriJoy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This little water bottle humidifier is fantastic! Instructions could have been a little better, but I was able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: I ❤️❤️❤️ My sense humidifier. It works so well ...
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️❤️❤️ My sense humidifier. It works so well . I have it near my bed. It works wonders. I’m no longer dry.!!
customer_reviews.author: malcolm l mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I live in a desert climate where humidity averages around 15% figured I should get some type of humidifier and find this one works pretty good I guess
customer_reviews.author: Sil3nt

product_meta.title: Sense Magic Humidifier with Water-Bottle Tank Adapter, 360 Degree Rotating Mist Spout, Easy Dial to Control Mist, Easy Breakdown for Easy Clean-Up, Helps with Dry Skin and Dry Nose (Blue)
product_meta.description: Sense Magic Humidifier uses adaptors that fit most water bottles as its water tank and produces a superfine mist, increasing the humidity to any room. Easy to use control knob allows you to adjust the humidity levels. Mist spout rotates 360 degrees, which allows the humidifier to aim in any direction. This model is easy to disassemble, allowing for a significantly easier time to clean and wash the humidifier, water bottle adaptor, or the mist spout. A humidifier reduces the risk of infection from air-born viruses and bacteria, which are known to travel less freely in moist air. Moisture is drained from your skin in a dry atmosphere, often leaving it dry and irritable. A humidifier can bring moisture back into the air, leaving a more vibrant skin. Dry air can cause a dry nasal passage. Sleeping with a humidifier can help relieve the sinus. A humidifier is not just meant for the people living in a household. They can also help house plants flourish. Please use Tap Water or non-purified water. CARE INSTRUCTIONS: To ensure proper use and maintenance, please keep the water tank of your unit clean from debris, dust, and mineral build-up. If there is mineral scaling, wash your unit with a mild detergent as soon as possible before hardening. Do not use harsh cleansers or abrasives as this can easily damage the misting mechanism.
feature_bullets: Sense Magic Humidifier uses adapters that fit most water bottles. There is no need to wash out a tank if dust or debris get into the water. Simply throw out the bottle and replace it with a clean one. Replacing the water is also very simple. You just take off the bottle cap of the water bottle and screw on the mouth of the adapter and place it into the reservoir opening. A spring pressure cap prevents the water from gushing out when inverted. PLEASE USE CORRECT CAP OR IT WILL LEAK.

Sense Magic Humidifier uses a rotatable mist spout that can be pointed 360 degrees. It is easily detachable for easy maintenance if something is spilled on it. The humidifier uses ultra-sonic pulse technology that creates super fine mist increasing the humidity in any room. THIS UNIT DOES NOT CREATE STEAM. The omnidirectional mist spout allows you to aim it in any direction.
Sense Magic Humidifier reduces air-born viruses and bacteria by increasing the humidity in the air. A healthy choice for those suffering from asthma, dry skin, sinus issues, sinus infections.

Sense Magic Humidifier does not use filters. You DO NOT have to buy EXTRA FILTERS. If the "tank" (water bottle) gets dirty, you can just dispose of it and use a water bottle you already have available in your home. Low mineral Tap Water is recommended for use. DO NOT use pure distilled water or the electric charge will not pass as easily through the water. NO EXTRA PURCHASES REQUIRED to operate this unit.

Sense Magic Humidifier is easily disassembled to help facilitate easier, faster cleaning if required. All the parts slide in and out of their positions so that unscrewing or unlocking components is not necessary. Please review the care instructions in your Operation Instructions for further details.
